protectionindicator-desc: An extension created for the purpose of adding protection indicators to pages.
protectionindicator-explanation-cascadin: This page is cascading "$2" protected until "$3". The "$1" is right are required to "$2" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal: This page is "$2" protected until "$3". The "$1" right is required to "$2" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-i: This page is "$2" protected. The "$1" right is required to "$2" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-flaggedr: This page is flaggedrevs protected until "$2". The "$1" right is required to review your own edits.
This page is pendingchanges. The "$1" right is required to review your own edits.
